title: Up Close and Personal: Collide
description: Shane Roderick’s talk show, Up Close and Personal, is on the verge of cancellation. His on-again, off-again relationship with Drew is mostly off. When he gets the scoop of a lifetime to interview a reclusive rock star and playboy extraordinaire, sparks fly and their intense chemistry leads to a night of passion that Shane is determined to leave in the past – but can he? Leo Malone’s return to Hollywood is carefully orchestrated by his manager to keep him on the straight and narrow. He is newly sober with a number one album, a North-American tour to promote, and a stunning girlfriend to boot. Why then is he haunted by memories of a one-night stand with a certain journalist?A chance meeting rekindles a deep passion in each of them, unlike anything they’ve felt before. What follows is an unexpected tale of romance and heartbreak, friendship and betrayal, and of course, lust and love. As Shane and Leo fall in and out of each other’s arms, they must decide if their relationship is worth defying the odds.
author: Jayson Leigh
